subject: Federal Bureau of Investigat
body:
Federal Bureau of Investigation
(FBI)Anti-Terrorist And Monitory Crime Division.
Federal Bureau Of Investigation.
J.Edgar.Hoover Building Washington Dc
Customers Service Hours / Monday To Saturday
Office Hours Monday To Saturday:
Message From New FBI DIRECTOR. Christopher Wray
GOOD DAY
We the Federal bureau of investigation (FBI) Washington, DC., believe you received the previous message we sent to you, we are writing to you today being 21st of December 2023 relating  prior to your dealings with the Chief Justice Of The Supreme Court Of United States, Hon. John Glover Roberts Jr requested  as the IRS demanded to singed your Tax clearance Certificate before allow agent to proceed to your house and handed  your overdue contract payment ATM VISA CARD worth $8.500.000.00 over to you, we have duly screened through this project as stipulated on our protocols of operation and have finally confirmed that your contract payment ATM VISA Card which sent by the Supreme Court Of United States is 100% genuine and hitch free from all facet and of which you have the lawful right to claim your fund without any further delay.
I want to personally assure you once again that you will have every course to smile and be happy upon signing  the Tax clearance Certificate on your name and free your ATM Card in the custody today so that you will start withdraw tomorrow  and the amount you will be withdraw per day is $10,000 USD until the total amount of $8.500.000.00 Million USD is completed withdraw by you, as we will continue monitoring all your services with them at all level as well as your  correspondence, until you have withdraw your funds completed from your ATM Visa card accordingly.
We are here to protect your interest and that is the reason why we are doing all we can to make sure all goes well this week, this is a huge amount of money which we don't wish for you to lose.
We understand that the signing  of your Tax clearance certificate  of your ATM Visa card fee might be too much for you to pay but  to further make things easier for your withdraw, we have discussed with the IRS, pleaded on your behalf for them to give you the grace of time to send the fee 
fee of $50.00 USD
 and they final agreed with us, but they tell me to ask you when it will be possible for you to send the signing fee of the $50.00 USD to enable your Certificate  been signed and free your ATM Card to your house so that you will start withdraw from your card like others .
Now you can tell me the date and time you will be able to come up with the last fee so that we will contact them. kindly reconfirm your delivery information to avoid wrong delivery
1. Your Full Names___
2. Country_____
3. Home Address___
4. Phone Number___
Christopher A. Wray
Federal Bureau of Investigation
J. Edgar Hoover Building
935 Pennsylvania Avenue,
NW Washington, D.C.
Contact Email:(
oflie3706@gmail.com
)

subject: Re:   Federal Bureau of Investigat
body:
Dear Sir,

I am writing in response to your email regarding the Tax Clearance for my ATM Visa Card. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring the legitimacy of this transaction.

However, I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding further. Firstly, could you please provide more details about the tax clearance fee? How is it calculated and why is it necessary?

Secondly, I would like to know more about the withdrawal process. You mentioned that I can withdraw USD per day until the total amount of Million USD is completed. Could you please provide more specifics on this?

Lastly, could you please confirm if there are any other fees or charges that I should be aware of?

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Melissa
